item.description:
A friend who lives in Hollis NH is opening her house up to us to watch a DVD - usually a foreign film - and also share something to eat.

I'll provide the address to those who RSVP.

Bring food to share.

Having scouted out the local Blockbuster I have a preliminary choice of a film, although that may change if the film I chose is not available that evening.

My first choice is "Nobody Knows" (2005). See http://www.rottentoma... for reviews.
item.why: The film should be thought provoking. I'm picking from a list of highly rated films.

group.name: Fun in So. NH and Merrimack Valley

item.name: foreign/art film (DVD) + potluck
